thread.title_full: The Killers Demand Free Panda Express For Life After Finding Their Lyrics In A Fortune Cookie - BuzzFeed News

author: Julia Reinstein
title: The Killers Demand Free Panda Express For Life After Finding Their Lyrics In A Fortune Cookie - BuzzFeed News
text:
Over a decade after their hit album Hot Fuss , The Killers spotted what they claimed as their lyrics in a pretty unexpected place: inside a Panda Express fortune cookie. ‚ÄúSmile like you mean it,‚Äù the fortune said, in what the band took as a reference to their song of the same title.
ID: 10301210 2. The band tweeted the fortune on Sunday, and demanded royalties in the form of ‚Äúorange chicken for life.‚Äù View this image ‚Ä∫
‚ÄúI‚Äôm thinkin‚Äô orange chicken for life and we‚Äôll let you off the hook for using our stuff,‚Äù the band wrote on Twitter.
ID: 10301389 3. People are living for the ~drama~. @thekillers
‚Äî naidelyn (@notnaidelyn) ID: 10301571 The band I love most blackmailing the restaurant I hate most...this is one of the most satisfying days of my life. https://t.co/TrmLhjEfkv
‚Äî Sean (@spuff96) ID: 10301579 and someone is calling my name from the back of panda express https://t.co/XEkJRWFYEi
‚Äî üïäsid üåø (@glssanimals) ID: 10301664 6. And rooting for them to get their lifetime of free Panda Express. Oh my gosh imagine getting free Panda express for life tho https://t.co/Jj8hZj9FqN
‚Äî Daire Twisp ‚òá (@DaireTwisp) ID: 10301650 Just make your next single "Honey Walnut Shrimp" and call it a wash. https://t.co/XcUfULiRhv
‚Äî HAVE MERCY (@HaveMercyMD) ID: 10301583 8. Though others don‚Äôt think the band has much of a case. You don't own the words Smile like you mean it & I think you'd find them hard to copyright tbh. https://t.co/ThUCF1IJZu
‚Äî Oscar the Grouch (@claireontoast) ID: 10301563 this just in: the killers invented every generic phrase ever https://t.co/e9mVA71SkB
‚Äî eli üê≤ (@animetitty) ID: 10301582 10. Panda Express later responded to say that ‚Äúwhen it comes to #OrangeChickenLove, we always mean it‚Äù ‚Äî though no word as to whether The Killers demands will be met. .@thekillers When it comes to #OrangeChickenLove, we always mean it.
‚Äî Panda Express (@PandaExpress) BuzzFeed News has reached out to Panda Express to find out if they‚Äôll be paying up.

Julia Reinstein is a reporter for BuzzFeed News and is based in New York. Contact Julia Reinstein at julia.reinstein@buzzfeed.com .
